titleStmt.title: A practical discourse of patience Setting forth the excellency usefulness and rewards thereof. By a divine of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Divine of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Samuel Lowndes over against Exeter Exchange in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: With errata on verso of A8, following the contents.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
